-e ---

𓀦

https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%27-l-k

𓂾 leg vs regal
𒁺𒁺 laḫ₅ vs 𒁺 RE₆

𒁺𒁺 laḫ₅ 𒁻 laḫ₄ walk הָלַךְ halákh
𒀠𒌨 ʷal-lik7 walk "march"
𒀠 𒆷 𒆪 ʷal-la-ku walker "messenger"
𒄿𒀧𒆷𒀝 ʷi-il-la-ak walk 𓂾 go 𒀀𒆷𒆠 ʷa-la-ki walk "route (of journey 𒄯𒊏𒉆)" 𒀀𒋃 ʷa-lak walk "advance" 𒀀𒋃 ᵐa-lak march 𒀀𒇷𒋻 ʷa-li-kut walked march
𒅋𒇷𒅗 il-li-ka ʷillika "went"
𒅋𒌨𒄠𒈠 il-lik-am-ma wailkame walk/come/came 𒀠𒋡𒀀 ʷal-qa-a walked "took, brought"
𒀠𒋡𒀀 ʰal-qa-a hulk, leach "take"
𒀠𒋡𒀀 ʰal-qaʳa carry 𒈠𒋃 ma-lak walk vs
𒈠𒋃 ma•rak march

𒅈𒁲 ᵐar-dj march 𒅈𒁲 ʷar-di warten > wade

𓂾 leg vs regal

𒁺 RE₆ regen regeln 𓂾 rekeln > 𒁺𒁺 laḫ₅ 𒁻 laḫ₄ walk הָלַךְ halákh

𒍖 walk pari-; uzzu-; uz-zu-un; uz-zu-un-ta 𓃀 partir, 𓃀 fuss, visa, passant 𒍖𒍪𒌦; 𒍖𒍪𒌦𒋫 ziehen

𐤏𐤋𐤉 ʿly

𐤅𐤕𐤌𐤀 𐤟 𐤌𐤇𐤍𐤕 𐤟 𐤏𐤋𐤉 𐤟 𐤂𐤁𐤋 w'tmʾ 𐤟 mḥnt 𐤟 ʿly 𐤟 gbl or a commander of the army [will rule/ march] over Byblos

𒄿𒇷𒅅𒋗 𒄿𒅋𒆷𒀝 i-li-ik.šu i-il-la-ak 𒄿𒇷𒅅𒋗 𒄿𒅋𒆷𒀝 "walk his walk" i.e. perform his ilkum-service

𒄿𒇷𒅅 𒀀𒁉𒋗 𒀀𒆷𒄭𒁁 𒆷 𒄿𒇷𒄿 ʷi-li-ik a-bi.šu ʷa-la-kam la ʷi-le-i cannot perform his father’s ilkum-service

𒄿𒇷𒅅 𒄿𒀧𒆷𒀝 i-li-ik … i-il-la-ak 𒄿𒇷𒅅 𒄿𒀧𒆷𒀝 ilik … illak
𒄿𒇷𒅅 𒄿𒀧𒆷𒀝 shall perform the duties (for field… ) "walk the walk"

𒀧𒆠 il-ki 𒀧𒆠 official property <> 𒀧𒄣 il-kum 𒀧𒄣 tenant

𒉿𒍣 waṣí vas goes out
